Strings.Text: A power panel... Some areas\ndo not have power...{scroll 2}{clear 0}Will you activate the\nblacked-out areas?{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
{scroll 2}\nA power regulator.{clear 0}{scroll 2}The voltage is incorrect.\nAdjust the wiring?{branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}Place 2 wires. When all\ngraphs extend into the red...{clear 0}{scroll 2}...the electricity\nwill be powered on.
